## Notifier interface

Provides change notifications for an observed subject.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface Notifier 
```

</th><th>

</th><th>

</th><th>

</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

[subject](../fast-element.notifier.subject/)


</td><td>

`readonly`


</td><td>

any


</td><td>

The object that subscribers will receive notifications for.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

Method


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

[notify(args)](../fast-element.notifier.notify/)


</td><td>

Notifies all subscribers, based on the args.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[subscribe(subscriber, propertyToWatch)](../fast-element.notifier.subscribe/)


</td><td>

Subscribes to notification of changes in an object's state.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[unsubscribe(subscriber, propertyToUnwatch)](../fast-element.notifier.unsubscribe/)


</td><td>

Unsubscribes from notification of changes in an object's state.


</td></tr>
